page.title: 09FARMING INDUSTRY.
page.content: This is either Sheep,Dairy,or Beef no cereals,the land is either Rough Fell open moor only suitable for grazing or Meadow/Pasture land for grazing & producing the winter hay & silage. 25% of the population,living in area are involved in farming,but many have land outside area,or live outside & farm within. {LIVE IN_OUTSIDE_BEEF_DAIRY_SHEEP_LAND { AREA _ AREA _ IN/OUT Arkle)* * * * * side)* * * * * * * Gammer* * * * * _gill* * * * * Horse)* * * * house)* * * 4* * * * 11Farms,only{3}contained within others only part of farm within survey area. A{100% SHEEP}production from all units
